item.title: PhD @ Cornell: The Free Agent system
item.description: Deciding which graduate school you’re going to spend the next n years of your life is possibly one of the hardest decision of your life. One of the things that made is particularly hard for me was deciding between Cornell and my other top choice was Cornell’s “Free agent system”. Here is a short post about what the system is and why it worked for me. How do grad schools work?
